mapper.select: select seq, id, subject, content, imgname, productCode, star, logtime as "date" from reviewboard

select orderNumber, productCode, mainSubject as title, status, qty, to_char(logtime,'yy-MM-dd') as logtime, thumbnail as img, reviewStatus from orderDetails join product using (productCode) join orderInfo using (orderNumber) where id = #{id} and status = 3 order by orderNumber asc, productCode asc
select count(*) as count, avg(star) as star from reviewboard where productCode = #{productCode}
mapper.insert: insert into reviewboard(seq, id, subject, content, imgName, productCode, star, logtime, orderNumber) values (seq_reviewboard.nextval, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{imgName}, #{productCode}, #{star}, sysdate, #{orderNumber})
mapper.update: update orderDetails set reviewStatus = 1 where orderNumber = #{orderNumber} and productCode = #{productCode}
